TopicTitle: Egad Brain, the windows are white!

Articles.Content:
Yes indeedy, my precious IVA windows seem to be covered in white paint.... (Must be another of Jeb's pranks....)

Seriously though, the windows in IVA are white. I've disabled the fallback shaders as per Claw's Known Issues and Self Help thread, with alas, no change. I am wondering if there is a work around for this issue or a fix for it. I didn't find another thread with this issue, outside of the Known thread, but

Alas my poor computer with KSP cannot connect to the net for now, so I'll be updating this when I can.

KSP v. .25 (will update more specifically)

Machine Specs:

CPU: AMD 9530

RAM: 16 GB

Vid-Card: nVidia GTX 560 Ti

HDD: 4x250GB

OS: Win 7 64 Ultimate w/ Service Pack 1

Thank you all in advance for the help!

Edit: Think I found the problem, but I need to know which files are used by the IVA Textures, which means, that the fault is in how the game is downloaded-- I used Steam.

Edited December 17, 2014 by Fizwalker
That's odd. Could you upload your output_log.txt and DxDiag per Claw's Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide?

Interesting. White windows... hm. Fallback shaders usually default them to a blank grey, so it's not that, seemingly. Have you tried updating your video card drivers? (If they're up to date already, it might even be worth trying to downgrade to a prior stable version.)

Interesting. White windows... hm. Fallback shaders usually default them to a blank grey, so it's not that, seemingly. Have you tried updating your video card drivers? (If they're up to date already, it might even be worth trying to downgrade to a prior stable version.)

Sorry for the late reply!

I hadn't updated my vid-card drivers when I first noticed them, and got the most recent ones.... With no effect. I've also tried a different card, with no joy.

Master Tao, I will upload those files tomorrow!

Thank you for the help so far! Again, I apologize for the tardiness!

I think i know what the issue might be, as it is similar to one I had with a modded onstall with ATM. I think the textures for the windows might be missing or corrupted. I`ll check that out after work.
Closing in! Which files are used in regards to the IVAs? Thank you for the help!
